sources.title: Polar Storm | Full Movie | Action Disaster | The End Is Here!
sources.description:
Polar Storm - When the comet “Copernicus” threatens the earth, James Mayfield, an astrophysicist in Washington State, his high school teacher wife and his teenaged son must do all that they can to save the world, their community and themselves.
2009.  Stars: Jack Coleman, Holly Elissa, Tyler Johnston
